sense.def:
To deflect something
, na primer pozornost ali kritičnost nekoga, pomeni povzročiti, da tista oseba nameni pozornost nečemu drugemu ali počne nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Their main purpose was to deflect attention from the Government's proposals.

sense.def:
To deflect something
pomeni povzročiti, da gre nekaj, kar se premika, v malce drugačno smer, na primer tako, da tisto sunemo ali potisnemo.

seg.quote: The two streams of water are deflected.
